profile.name: BLRRDPCTRS
profile.tagline: Producer & DJ – House, Pop, DnB, Techno
profile.bio: Julius, 21, Producer & DJ aus Karlsruhe, DE. Kollaborationen & Support von MoTi, Fox Stevenson, Arcando, Don Diablo, Tita Lau. 200k Streams unter eigenem Namen, 15k Monthly Spotify Listener. Releases auf Loud Memory (Sony Belgium), Chapter Eight, Magic Music, Storm, Seal Network.

achievements: Support & Plays von Don Diablo, Tita Lau and more
Releases auf Loud Memory, Chapter Eight, Magic Music, Storm, Seal Network
